categories: Category:The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark

nodes.text: "The Shadow of Umbara" is a short story that was published in the anthology The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark, adapting the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Darkness on Umbara," "The General," "Plan of Dissent," and "Carnage of Krell." It was written by Yoon Ha Lee, and published on August 25, 2020 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
